solution_line_template: Four pies, each cut into {pieces_per_pie} pieces, contain {num_pies}*{pieces_per_pie}=<<{num_pies}*{pieces_per_pie}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pieces.
Thus, there are {total_apples}/{total_pieces}=<<{total_apples}/{total_pieces}={apples_per_slice}>>{apples_per_slice} apples in every slice of Cassandra's apple pie.
